title: France panorama. [No. 72/36]
creator_contributor_role: Societe Nouvelle Pathe Cinema, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Dams - Environmental aspects
description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: Equestrian sport - international show jumping meet at Dinard in Brittany. Prehistoric fauna - new items in the collections of France's Museum of Natural History. 2. The arts: Modern sculpture - contemporary sculptures at Paris' Museum of Modern Art. 3. Nature and hydraulics - dams and the French landscape. 4. The master glaziers and stained glass windows - designing and manufacturing of stained glass windows.
